templates.subject: Your item was removed
templates.body: We removed your item for violating our P1 policy: [category]. You can edit and appeal within 7 days. Reason: [rule].

templates.subject: Changes required to publish your item
templates.body: Your item needs changes to comply with [policy label]. Please remove/modify: [details]. It will remain limited until resolved.

templates.subject: Age warning applied to your item
templates.body: Your item is still available with an age warning due to [category]. It’s excluded from feeds and search.

templates.subject: Distribution limited
templates.body: To reduce potential harm, we limited distribution of your item under [policy label] for [duration] days. It may not appear in feeds or search.

templates.subject: Policy warning
templates.body: We recorded a violation under [policy label]. Further violations may result in suspension.

templates.subject: Account suspension
templates.body: Your account is suspended until [date] for repeated violations under [category]. You may appeal once.

templates.subject: Permanent ban for zero‑tolerance violation
templates.body: Your content violated a zero‑tolerance rule (P0): [category]. Your account is permanently banned. See our policy for details.
